DOC.brief_summary: Perioperative goal direct fluid therapy may reduce complication rate surgery . Minimal invasive cardiac output monitor key method guide fluid therapy . More operation perform keyhole surgery ( laparoscopy ) . For laparoscopy , abdomen fill carbon dioxide . Increased pressure abdomen may influence minimal cardiac output monitoring , therefore minimal cardiac output monitoring recommend laparoscopy . This study aim validate minimal cardiac output monitor laparoscopy therefore facilitate goal direct fluid therapy .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence Pneumoperitoneum Minimal Invasive Cardiac Output Measurements
